english.segment1: CHORUS. I can't change by myself no I can't live without You(2x). Day by day, I'm a slave to my ambition to be free. Feel so dead in this web I've spun around me. The seeds of hate I've sown they grow to entangle me. Why can't I see that true freedom comes from You. Everywhere I see Your face en creation. But the love You've shown was not for me alone. My color of skin cannot determine what my heart reveals. Why can't I see that true beauty comes from You. So free my mind. 'Cause I want to live
